name: places/ChIJD6RGPoVYwokRRP_Z6QozjJM
formattedAddress: 251 W 74th St, New York, NY 10023, USA
adrFormatAddress: 251 W 74th St, New York, NY 10023, USA

originalText.text: T was AMAZING!! I called her for a last minute shoot for myself (I'm a photographer and was getting my portraits done.) I had seen that her and . her team do a lot of on-screen & commercial work so I knew she would be perfect for my needs & she totally exceeded them. Arrived early and SLAYED with my makeup. I got so many compliments throughout the day and more importantly, it looked so natural and just like "me." I don't wear a lot of makeup at all and T gave me a classic,  very natural look that didn't make me feel like someone else, but was still an elevated feel and clean for the camera. She is so easy to talk with, has a great bubbly personality and made me feel super comfortable. I will absolutely hire her again! :))

originalText.text: T is as good at it gets! I contacted her a few months back when I was in dire need of someone to do my hair for my brother's wedding. I am a black woman with natural, coarse hair -- so I needed someone who iss familiar with the texture but could achieve a smooth look. I also needed her to do my mother's hair (also black and natural) and 3-year old daughter's hair (who is biracial) -- so she needed to handle multiple styles!  Each time I emailed T, she responded within a few hours. T arrived early on the morning of my brother's wedding and did a superior job on all of us! My hair turned out BETTER than all the photos I had showed to T for inspiration! My hair was absolutely stunning -- literally the first thing I said and thought when I saw the final product was, "omg, I wish you did my hair for my own wedding years ago!" My mother and daughter looked beautiful as well. Stop your search for a stylist - contact T and put your mind at ease!

originalText.text:
Dana and T were AWESOME! I am so glad that they were recommended for on-location hair and makeup by my wedding planner. They took care of three generations of my family at my hotel - my mother, tween stepdaughter and me. They made everyone look and feel beautiful, while keeping the makeup natural - we were just better versions of ourself, which is exactly what I requested :) They were extremely responsive throughout the planning process and gave me exactly what I asked for. Having them come to me took the stress out of the day, and they arrived and finished perfectly on time. And best of all, they are absolutely lovely, positive, friendly people who are a joy to be around. I would highly recommend them for wedding hair and makeup to anyone that asks!

Thanks Dana and T for helping me look and feel my best on my wedding day! You guys rock!

originalText.text: Ms. T did my hair and makeup for a photo shoot and she made me feel and look like the envy of all women. She is amazing and for someone who doesn't regularly do their hair and makeup, she made me want to start.
